_items.body: I'm concerned about my child's safety during the activities. How do you ensure they're always supervised?

Safety is our top priority. Each group of students has dedicated teachers accompanying them at all times. Additionally, trained professionals conduct all adventure activities, and medical support is always readily available.
What happens in case of a medical emergency?
We have detailed medical plans for each location. Immediate medical attention is available on-site, and we have clear protocols for reaching local hospitals quickly if necessary."
How often can we communicate with our children during the trip?
Students will have daily opportunities to contact home, typically during evening reflection periods. We also provide regular updates and photos through our secured communication platform.
Our child has special dietary restrictions and allergies.

Regarding dietary restrictions and allergies, we carefully document each student's specific needs in advance and coordinate closely with our providers to ensure safe, suitable meals throughout the trip.
How do we know about visa and passport restrictions?

Our team will manage the collection and secure handling of passports and visas well ahead of the trip date, ensuring that all required travel documents are safely kept and easily accessible when needed.
Thanks for your help! Sounds fun!
You are very welcome. I hope to see your child on the trip!

_items.body: Is your child going to Week Without Walls?

_options.optionText: Yes, I am planning on sending my child on Week Without Walls.
No, my child will not be attending.

_items.body: You will need to await further communications about the in-country option for your child that week.
Great! We will have a parent information coming up where I will cover more details on the specific trips taking place.
Excellent! Will your child's passport be valid by the departure date?
Perfect! You can proceed with payment to the school, and your child's spot will be reserved. We also recommend attending the upcoming parent info night at school.
We recommend that your child's passport is sorted before proceeding with payment. Please communicate us with any further questions.
